content: 1983 Singaporean TV series or program **The Flying Fish** ([Chinese](/wiki/Chinese_language): 小飞鱼; lit. 'Little Flying Fish') is an 8-episode [Singaporean](/wiki/Singapore) television drama series produced by [Singapore Broadcasting Corporation](/wiki/Singapore_Broadcasting_Corporation) in 1983. It revolves around the travails of an aspiring teenage swimmer and is considered one of the first locally produced "idol dramas". ## Cast - [Wang Yuqing](/wiki/Wang_Yuqing) as Wang Shuqi. A 17-year-old whose interest lies not in studying and preparing for University, but in swimming. This passion comes much to the chagrin of his father, who strongly believes that if Shuqi does not enter a university, it would bring immense shame to him and the family. - Chen Bifeng as Wang's sister. - Chen Weifen - Huang Xiang Qing - Ang Peng Bee as Chen Shuyu - Maggie Teng as Chen Baoer - [Zeng Huifen](/wiki/Zeng_Huifen) as Ah Fen ## Episodes EpisodeTitleOriginal airdate1"Episode One"August 12, 1983 (1983-08-12)2"Episode Two"August 19, 1983 (1983-08-19)3"Episode Three"August 26, 1983 (1983-08-26)4"Episode Four"September 2, 1983 (1983-09-02)5"Episode Five"September 9, 1983 (1983-09-09)6"Episode Six"September 16, 1983 (1983-09-16)7"Episode Seven"September 23, 1983 (1983-09-23)8"Episode Eight (Finale)"September 30, 1983 (1983-09-30) ## Reception A survey by Frank Small and Associates Marketing and Research Consultants estimated over 600,000 watched the series. - [The Champion](/wiki/The_Champion_(TV_series)), a 2004 [MediaCorp](/wiki/Mediacorp) TV series that revolved around two professional swimming teams. - [No Limits](/wiki/No_Limits_(Singaporean_TV_series)), a 2010 [Mediacorp](/wiki/Mediacorp) TV series that revolved around two swimming sisters who were born by the same mother and different fathers. - VOD page on XinMSN - [List of Flying Fish episodes](/wiki/List_of_Flying_Fish_(TV_series)_episodes) This Singaporean television-related article is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it. - v - t - e This drama television program–related article is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it. - v - t - e
title: The Flying Fish
